section.name: Instance Manager
section.p: A Component is responsible for the management of a set of service provider Instance(s). The number of instances managed by a component is implementation dependent. The reference implementation maintains instances relative to the associated lifestyle and collection policies. For example, a component declaring the SINGLETON collection policy will have a 0..1 Instance association. The lifetime of the instance will be a function of the associated collection policy and usage contitions.
An Instance provides the following functions:

ol.li: access to the concrete provider instance with support for isolution of the instance within a proxy exposing only the service interfaces
access to the provider state and as a consequence the available transitions and dynamic mangement operations
